Welcome to thobject's documentation!
=================================

This module is an object management module made by `Thomas Touhey`_ (``th``
is for ``touhey``) for the `sgdfi`_ project. It provides the following
features:

- easy object defining with the utilities that come with it.
- database compatibility layer.

To install the module, use pip:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ pip install thobject

For more information and links, consult `the official website`_.
